name: Nidoking

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.text: The Defending Pok√©mon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

flavorText: Uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break its prey's bones.

strengths: Toxic deals double poison damage (20 per turn)
Grass type can hit Water Pokemon weakness
Thrash can deal 40 damage on heads
weaknesses: Thrash has self-damage risk on tails
synergies: Double Colorless Energy - Powers Thrash faster

competitiveHistory: Nidoking saw occasional play due to Toxic's powerful double poison damage. The 20 damage per turn from Toxic added significant pressure, but the Stage 2 requirement and Psychic weakness limited its competitive viability.

rulings.ruling: Toxic replaces any existing Poison condition with the enhanced 20-damage-per-turn Poison.
The Toxic Poison deals 20 damage after EACH player's turn, not just the Nidoking player's turn.
If a Pokemon is already Poisoned and hit by Toxic, the Poison becomes Toxic (20 damage).
